about_the_game:
When the Past was Around is an adventure point-and-click puzzle game about love, moving on, letting go, and the joy and pain of everything in between.

If you like the prologue chapter of When the Past was Around and want to show your support, this DLC was made for you.

P.S.: The content of the Supporter Pack will be updated with the complete Art & Soundtrack DLC once the game is released.

This Supporter Pack includes:
  • 3 High-resolution wallpapers for desktop and mobile
  • HD promotional arts
  • All in-game assets
  • Early development sketches
  • 2 background music

Accessing the DLC:
After purchasing and downloading the Supporter Pack, you can access the content in the game's directory folder.
Here are the steps to access the files:
  • Open up Steam and go to your Library tab
  • Right click on When the Past was Around and select Properties
  • In the properties window, select Local Files tab and find the "Browse Local Files" button
  • This will take you to the When the Past was Around game directory, which has the Supporter Pack included in it
